amendment.description: Amendment terminates an agreement the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) has entered into with the Mexican government known as the "Partnership for Nutrition Assistance Program".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to terminate an agreement the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA ) has entered in with the Mexican government known as the "Partnership for Nutrition Assistance Program.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
